name: Ky'ra
description:
A game made for GDevelop Game Jam #1  where we can create our own boss.

Credits:

musics : https://www.zapsplat.com and https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon

sound effects :  https://www.zapsplat.com

background : https://edermunizz.itch.io

bullet assets : https://ansimuz.itch.io

mc assets :  https://luizmelo.itch.io

boss asset : http://www.akashics.moe

This game supports mobile devices, but I am experiencing fps drops on all mobile devices I have tried, so please let me know if you can play the game on your mobile device.
